item.title: The Perfect Outfit...for my Window!
item.description: When it comes to window furnishings, curtains really know how to transform a room….in a good way! Some of you may have horrible memories of lacey sheers paired with floral yellow and brown drapes at your Nanna’s shabby chic house but let me assure you… that ship has sailed!
